briefTitle: Sildenafil in HFpEF (Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction) and PH
officialTitle: Effects of Sildenafil on Pulmonary Arterial Pressure in Patients With Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction ( HFpEF) and Pulmonary Hypertension
summary: Aim of the study is to investigate whether Sildenafil treatment results in a reduction of pulmonary artery pressure without decrease of cardiac output (CO) and in improvement of exercise capacity in patients with heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFpEF) with pulmonary hypertension ( PH).

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Pulmonary Artery Pressure Measured by Right Heart Catheterization
